inclusion.criterion: During the study of all smear positive pulmonary tuberculosis with suspicious symptoms
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Can provide 3-4ml sputum samples three times in 2 days
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: the quality of sputum specimen is not qualified (sputum sample is less than 3ml or saliva sputum)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: sample estimate Method and formula: according to the national tuberculosis drug resistance in the baseline survey results, isoniazid, rifampicin, fluoroquinolones and streptomycin anti tuberculosis drugs, fluoroquinolones resistance rate is low; using fluoroquinolones detection estimation sample content, can meet the needs of other anti tuberculosis drug resistance rate analysis.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient A has smear-positive pulmonary TB with suspicious symptoms and can provide sputum samples. However, the quality of the sputum specimen is not qualified due to low fluoroquinolones resistance rate.
